property.name: insertBookmarkQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO catgenome.bookmark ( bookmark_id, bookmark_name, start_index, end_index, referred_chromosome_id, created_date, owner) VALUES ( :BOOKMARK_ID, :BOOKMARK_NAME, :START_INDEX, :END_INDEX, :REFERRED_CHROMOSOME_ID, :CREATED_DATE, :OWNER)

property.name: updateBookmarkQuery
property.value: UPDATE catgenome.bookmark SET bookmark_name = :BOOKMARK_NAME, start_index = :START_INDEX, end_index = :END_INDEX, owner = :OWNER WHERE bookmark_id = :BOOKMARK_ID

property.name: loadAllBookmarksQuery
property.value: SELECT b.bookmark_id, b.bookmark_name, b.start_index, b.end_index, b.referred_chromosome_id, c.chromosome_name, b.created_date, b.owner FROM catgenome.bookmark b JOIN catgenome.chromosome c ON b.referred_chromosome_id = c.chromosome_id

property.name: searchBookmarksQuery
property.value: SELECT b.bookmark_id, b.bookmark_name, b.start_index, b.end_index, b.referred_chromosome_id, null as chromosome_name, b.created_date, b.owner FROM catgenome.bookmark b WHERE bookmark_name LIKE :BOOKMARK_NAME LIMIT :SEARCH_LIMIT

property.name: searchBookmarkCountQuery
property.value: SELECT count(*) as count FROM catgenome.bookmark WHERE bookmark_name LIKE :BOOKMARK_NAME

property.name: loadBookmarkByIdQuery
property.value: SELECT b.bookmark_id, b.bookmark_name, b.start_index, b.end_index, b.referred_chromosome_id, c.chromosome_name, b.created_date, b.owner FROM catgenome.bookmark b JOIN catgenome.chromosome c ON b.referred_chromosome_id = c.chromosome_id WHERE bookmark_id = ?

property.name: loadBookmarksByIdsQuery
property.value: SELECT b.bookmark_id, b.bookmark_name, b.start_index, b.end_index, b.referred_chromosome_id, c.chromosome_name, b.created_date, b.owner FROM catgenome.bookmark b JOIN catgenome.chromosome c ON b.referred_chromosome_id = c.chromosome_id JOIN t_list tmp ON b.bookmark_id = tmp.list_value WHERE tmp.list_id = ?

property.name: insertBookmarkItemsQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO catgenome.bookmark_item ( bookmark_item_id, bookmark_id, bio_data_item_id) VALUES ( :BOOKMARK_ITEM_ID, :BOOKMARK_ID, :BIOLOGICAL_ITEM_ID)

property.name: loadBookmarksItemsQuery
property.value:
SELECT book.bookmark_id,
b.bio_data_item_id, b.name, b.type, b.path, b.format, b.created_date, b.pretty_name, b.owner,
v.vcf_id, v.reference_genome_id as vcf_reference_genome_id, v.compressed as vcf_compressed,
g.gene_item_id, g.reference_genome_id as gene_reference_genome_id, g.compressed as gene_compressed, g.external_db_type_id as gene_external_db_type_id, g.external_db_id as gene_external_db_id, g.external_db_organism as gene_external_db_organism,
r.reference_genome_id, r.reference_genome_size, r.gene_item_id as reference_gene_item_id, rgb.name as reference_gene_item_name, rgb.bio_data_item_id as reference_gene_bio_data_item_id, rgb.type as reference_gene_type, rgb.path as reference_gene_path, rgb.format as reference_gene_format, rgb.created_date as reference_gene_created_date, rg.reference_genome_id as reference_gene_reference_genome_id, rg.compressed as reference_gene_compressed,
m.bam_id, m.reference_genome_id as bam_reference_genome_id,
bg.bed_graph_id, bg.reference_genome_id as bed_graph_reference_genome_id,
bd.bed_id, bd.reference_genome_id as bed_reference_genome_id, bd.compressed as bed_compressed,
s.seg_id, s.reference_genome_id as seg_reference_genome_id, s.compressed as seg_compressed,
maf.maf_id, maf.reference_genome_id as maf_reference_genome_id, maf.compressed as maf_compressed, maf.real_path as maf_real_path,
vg.vg_id, vg.reference_genome_id as vg_reference_genome_id, vg.real_path as vg_real_path,
i.bio_data_item_id as index_id, i.name as index_name, i.type as index_type, i.path as index_path, i.format as index_format, i.bucket_id as index_bucket_id, i.created_date as index_created_date FROM catgenome.bookmark_item book JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item b ON b.bio_data_item_id = book.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.vcf v ON v.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.gene_item g ON g.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id
LEFT JOIN catgenome.reference_genome r ON r.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.gene_item rg ON r.gene_item_id = rg.gene_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item rgb ON rg.bio_data_item_id = rgb.bio_data_item_id
LEFT JOIN catgenome.bam m ON m.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.bed_graph bg ON bg.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.bed bd ON bd.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.seg s ON s.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.maf maf ON maf.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.vg vg ON vg.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item i ON i.bio_data_item_id = m.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = g.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = v.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = bd.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = s.index_id WHERE book.bookmark_id IN @in@
